description.@en: With but an utterance, you steal the ability of another to speak.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you immediately silence one foe and render them unable to verbally communicate whatsoever. Your foe can successfully Resist with an Awareness Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe is unable to Resist this Magick.

criticalFailure.@en: An invisible, demonic cat steals your tongue and will not return it for 24 hours. During this time, you cannot speak.

reagents.@en: A silver thimble placed upon your finger, raised to your lips

system.distance: Any one person you can see
